Note : The Welsh letter W is pronounced similar to the U in English .

The National Assembly Commission , which is currently working on a bill for name changes , said : “ The final decision on the designation of members of the National Assembly naturally lies with the members themselves . ”
The 2017 Government of Wales Act allowed the Welsh Parliament to change its name .
Last June , the Commission published the results of a public hearing on the proposals that broadly support the change in the name of the Welsh Parliament .
On the issue of the title of Members of the Assembly , the Commission preferred Welsh MEPs or WMPs , but the MWP option received most support in a public survey .

Members of the Welsh Parliament seem to propose alternative options , but the fight to reach a consensus could cause headaches to the Chairman Elin JONES , who is expected to present a bill for these changes in the coming weeks .
The legislation on reforms will involve changes in the functioning of the Assembly , including the rules for disqualifying members of the Welsh Parliament and the design of the exchange system .

Independent schools in Scotland have a track record of top academic quality , which continued in 2018 with excellent audit results , including individual and group successes in sport , art , music , and other Community enterprises .

With over 30,000 students throughout Scotland , these schools , represented by the Scottish Council of Independent Schools ( SCIS ) , strive to offer their pupils and parents the best level of service .
Independent schools are designed to prepare students – for further education , including universities , for their desired career and for their role as global citizens .
In the education sector , we have the opportunity to develop and implement a tailor-made school curriculum , noting that modern languages are still popular and desired in schools .
Nelson Mandela once said this : “ When you speak to a man in the language he understands , you reach his mind . ”
When you speak to him in his own language , he goes to his heart . ”
This shows impressively that we cannot rely solely on English if we want to build relations and trust with people from other countries .
The audit results of this year show that languages are at the top of the tables with the highest existing rates in independent schools .
68 percent of students who have studied foreign languages have reached the so-called “ Higher grade A ” higher class A .

The data collected by the 74 member schools of the SCIS showed that 72 percent of students reached a “ higher grade A ” in Mandarin , while among the students who learned German , French and Spanish , 72 , 69 and 63 reached note A each .
This shows that independent schools in Scotland promote foreign languages as essential skills that children and young people will undoubtedly need in the future .
Language subjects have the same rank in independent schools and elsewhere as MINT subjects ( mathematics , information technology , science and technology ) .
A 2014 survey by the British Employment and Qualifications Commission found that 17 % of the reasons why employers had difficulty filling vacancies are attributable to a lack of language skills .
Therefore , language skills are becoming increasingly necessary to prepare young people for their professional future .
Given more promising employment opportunities that require languages , these skills are essential in a globalised world .
Regardless of the career that someone chooses when he has learned a second language , he will have a real advantage in the future with a lifelong ability like this .
Through the ability to communicate directly with people from abroad , a multilingual person will automatically be ahead of the competitors .

According to a YouGov survey with more than 4,000 adults in the United Kingdom in 2013 , 75 % were unable to speak a foreign language well enough to conduct a conversation , and French is the only language spoken with a double-digit percentage , 15 % .

When children learn to speak multiple languages – especially those of developing countries – they will later have better chances of finding a meaningful job in the labour market .
Schools in Scotland differ in terms of their language range .
Some schools focus on classical modern languages , while other languages that are most important for Britain in 2020 , such as Mandarin or Japanese .
Whatever your child is interested , a number of languages will always be available in independent schools , with teachers specialized in this field .

Independent schools in Scotland want to provide a learning environment that is well prepared for children , and they should be given the necessary tools for their success whatever the future may bring .
In today ’ s global business world , languages remain undeniably important for the country ’ s future , and this must also be reflected in education .
Indeed , modern languages should be truly regarded as “ international communication skills . ”
Independent schools will continue to offer young people in Scotland this choice , diversity and top quality .
